Current line-up 
Sakis Tolis (formerly Necromayhem) - Guitars, Vocals (1987-) (Thou Art Lord, Desolation (Grc))
George Bokos - Guitars (2005-) (Sickening Horror, Obsecration, Nightfall (Grc), Exhibition (Grc))
Andreas Lagios - Bass (1996-) (Nightstalker (Grc))
Themis Tolis (formerly Necrosauron) - Drums (1987-) (Zemial (Grc), Thou Art Lord) 


*Audio part of 2DVD/2CD set includes 25 tracks from 20th anniversary show in Athens 8th December 2007 and 7 tracks recorded live in February 2007 at B-Live in Larisa, Greece
